results.name: Number of ordered ways of writing n^2 as a sum of n squares of nonnegative integers.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100 (first 81 terms from Seiichi Manyama)
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1/t!, (s->
program: (PARI) {a(n) = polcoeff((sum(k=0, n, x^(k^2)+x*O(x^(n^2))))^n, n^2)} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 28 2018
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jan 17 2018
